doc.plot: On New Years eve of the year 2000, the paths of eight persons cross in an unexpectable and dramatic way. A businessman, who weavers between his wife and his mistress, faces an extortion of extremes. An unemployed man, becomes a hired killer to escape from his misery. A child wanders the streets alone, trying to survive. Is the dawning of the millennium the beginning of a new epoque, or is it that behind all of the glittering celebrations, people are experiencing a different reality?
